articles.title: Microsoft's Activision Blizzard deal now facing "in-depth" investigation by EU - Eurogamer.net

articles.content: The European Commission has announced that, following its initial investigation into Microsoft's proposed $69bn acquisition of Activision Blizzard, it will now be opening a more "in-depth" Phase 2 pr… [+3058 chars]
